result.title: Invitation to CodeMutants-2018
result.content:
TALK IS CHEAP,SHOW ME THE CODE----Linus Torvalds

Hello CodeForces,

Greetings to all the PROgramming enthusiast as Synapse : The annual Cultural festival of Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology ( DAIICT -Gandhinagar) is around and so is the CodeMutants : The PROgramming Contest. Here all the PROgrammers get chance to prove themselves in time as little as 3 hours as well as grab some Prizes.

It's time to put on your thinking caps and prove yourselves as this year competition will be intense when prizes worth 10,000 INR are on stacks and only the first few coders in the queue of leader board can win it. Also keeping in mind encouragement of new programmers one winner from first year of Universities will get priority in this queue of conquerors.

The problems have been set and tested by Mohib Manva(mohib85), Utsav Rajpara(Learner99), TaniK Pansuriya(Joker_98), Bhargav Ajudiya(Ajudiya_13) and me(unbeaten_coder).

Contest Details are as follows:

DATE : 20th February,2018.

TIME : 9pm to 12am.

Link : https://www.hackerearth.com/challenge/college/codemutants-synapse-2018/

Link to Google Form : https://goo.gl/forms/D4mXwpEVrmeuaovY2

NOTE : ONLY PARTICIPANTS WHO WILL FILL OUT THE GIVEN GOOGLE FORM WILL BE ELIGIBLE FOR PRIZES.

NOTE : ONLY PARTICIPANTS OF INDIAN UNIVERSITIES/COLLEGE WILL BE ELIGIBLE FOR PRIZES.

If you have any other queries you can contact either of the two contacts given below at anytime.

Kirtan Patel:+91-9825266550

Utsav Rajpara:+91-9426610799

Hoping to see you all in large numbers!!

Team CodeMutants â€” SYNAPSE, DAIICT.
